verbs.description: [V: rensselaer] county democrats endorse town justice for da run the rensselaer county democrats unanimously endorsed east greenbush town justice mary pat donnelly thursday night to run for district attorney as the republican incumbent awaits trial on criminal charges our party is energized about the real opportunity we have this year to elect a district attorney who will restore integrity and competence to that important office county democratic chairman michael monescalchi said east greenbush girls softball league east greenbush zoning board of appeals sgt patrick donnelly east greenbush new york albany new york east greenbush east greenbush school district rensselaer county new york
